title: What's a Nice Girl Like You Doing in a Place Like This?
original_title: What's a Nice Girl Like You Doing in a Place Like This?
overview: A writer named Algernon (but called Harry by his friends) buys a picture of a boat on a lake, and his obsession with it renders normal life impossible.
synopsis: A writer named Algernon (but called Harry by his friends) buys a picture of a boat on a lake, and his obsession with it renders normal life impossible.
